dataIdInfo.idAbs: ArcGIS Pro tool to inventory Portal and/or ArcGIS Online services and/or web mapping applications in tabular format and/or user-friendly Excel spreadsheets. In ArcGIS Pro, the tool inventories the active Portal or ArcGIS Online organizations using the logged in account. (Accounts with limited permissions will result in less comprehensive inventories.) In a stand-alone Python window, the user provides a portal object to the script tool(s) to generate the inventories for that portal or AGOL.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: ArcGIS Pro tool to inventory Portal and/or ArcGIS Online services and/or web mapping applications in tabular format and/or user-friendly Excel spreadsheets. The Excel formats support user review and interaction via text searches and hyperlinks between formatted tables and worksheets.
